item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Petco Health, Celsius, Affirm, Caterpillar and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Alibaba, Ulta, Dell Technologies, Caterpillar and more

item.title: Fed's Waller, a candidate for chair, sees potential for half-point cut if labor market weakens further
item.description: Waller said he believes the Fed can use its power over rates to stave off further labor market weakening. "So, let's get on with it," he said.

item.title: Affirm's stock soars 15% on earnings, revenue beat
item.description: Affirm's earnings per share of 20 cents for the quarter was almost double what Wall Street expected.

item.title: How Italy's banking M&A wave started crashing
item.description: The merger fever that's gripped Italy's banking sector showed signs of abating this summer — but its end isn't nigh.
